EmailTemplate.name: 30 day Late Fee Invoice Generated Template
EmailTemplate.subject: 30 Day Late Fee Applied on {!Case.Type} Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your first invoice is still outstanding and has not been paid in 30 days. This is a notification that a 30-day late fee has been applied. Your new total required payment is {!Case.Net_Due__c}. Your attached invoice is below. Please review the invoice and proceed with payment from the link provided. Installation of your request will not begin until payment has been received and processed.
{!Case.Link}
Thank you,
SFMTA
